name: Chikorita
flavorText:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

name: Bayleef
flavorText:
The scent of
spices comes from
around its neck. Somehow, sniffing
it makes you want
to fight.

name: Meganium
flavorText:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.

name: Cyndaquil
flavorText:
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on
its back burn more vigorously.

name: Quilava
flavorText:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.

name: Typhlosion
flavorText:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

name: Totodile
flavorText:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

name: Croconaw
flavorText:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

name: Feraligatr
flavorText:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

name: Sentret
flavorText:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

name: Furret
flavorText:
It makes a nest to
suit its long and
skinny body. The nest is impossible
for other POKéMON
to enter.

name: Hoothoot
flavorText:
It always stands
on one foot. It
changes feet so fast, the movement
can rarely be
seen.

name: Noctowl
flavorText:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.

name: Ledyba
flavorText:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

name: Ledian
flavorText:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.

name: Spinarak
flavorText:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.

name: Ariados
flavorText:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.

name: Crobat
flavorText:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.

name: Chinchou
flavorText:
Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one
another to claim their respective turf.

name: Lanturn
flavorText:
The light it emits
is so bright that
it can illuminate the sea's surface
from a depth of
over three miles.

name: Pichu
flavorText:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.
formDescription: Spiky-eared Pichu can only be received by taking the shiny Pichu from an official promotion to celebi's shrine in ilex forest.  Spiky-eared Pichu is always female, cannot evolve, cannot be taken into the Wi-Fi Club or the Union Room, and cannot be transferred to Generation V, but is otherwise a normal Pichu.

name: Cleffa
flavorText:
Because of its
unusual, star-like
silhouette, people believe that it
came here on
a meteor.

name: Igglybuff
flavorText:
It has a very soft
body. If it starts
to roll, it will bounce all over
and be impossible
to stop.

name: Togepi
flavorText:
The shell seems to
be filled with
joy. It is said that it will share
good luck when
treated kindly.

name: Togetic
flavorText:
They say that it
will appear before
kindhearted, car­ ing people and
shower them with
happiness.

name: Natu
flavorText:
Because its wings
aren't yet fully
grown, it has to hop to get around.
It is always star­
ing at something.

name: Xatu
flavorText:
They say that it
stays still and
quiet because it is seeing both the
past and future at
the same time.

name: Mareep
flavorText:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

name: Flaaffy
flavorText:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.

name: Ampharos
flavorText:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

name: Bellossom
flavorText:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: Marill
flavorText:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

name: Azumarill
flavorText:
It lives in water virtually all day long.
Its body color and pattern act as
camouflage that makes it tough for
enemies to spot in water.

name: Sudowoodo
flavorText:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

name: Politoed
flavorText:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.

name: Hoppip
flavorText:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

name: Skiploom
flavorText:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

name: Jumpluff
flavorText:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

name: Aipom
flavorText:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

name: Sunkern
flavorText:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

name: Sunflora
flavorText:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

name: Yanma
flavorText:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

name: Wooper
flavorText:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

name: Quagsire
flavorText:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

name: Espeon
flavorText:
It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

name: Umbreon
flavorText:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

name: Murkrow
flavorText:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

name: Slowking
flavorText:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

name: Misdreavus
flavorText:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

name: Unown
flavorText:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.
formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined at random before a wild encounter and cannot be changed.

name: Wobbuffet
flavorText:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

name: Girafarig
flavorText:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

name: Pineco
flavorText:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

name: Forretress
flavorText:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

name: Dunsparce
flavorText:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.

name: Gligar
flavorText:
It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.

name: Steelix
flavorText:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.

name: Snubbull
flavorText:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

name: Granbull
flavorText:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

name: Qwilfish
flavorText:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

name: Scizor
flavorText:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

name: Shuckle
flavorText:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

name: Heracross
flavorText:
It is usually docile, but if it is
disturbed while sipping honey,
it chases off the intruder with its horn.

name: Sneasel
flavorText:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

name: Teddiursa
flavorText:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

name: Ursaring
flavorText:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

name: Slugma
flavorText:
It never sleeps.
It has to keep
moving because if it stopped, its
magma body would
cool and harden.

name: Magcargo
flavorText:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

name: Swinub
flavorText:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

name: Piloswine
flavorText:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

name: Corsola
flavorText:
It continuously
sheds and grows.
The tip of its head is prized as
a treasure for its
beauty.

name: Remoraid
flavorText:
It has superb ac­
curacy. The water
it shoots out can strike even moving
prey from more
than 300 feet.

name: Octillery
flavorText:
It traps enemies
with its suction-
cupped tentacles then smashes them
with its rock-hard
head.

name: Delibird
flavorText:
It carries food
all day long.
There are tales about lost people
who were saved by
the food it had.

name: Mantine
flavorText:
As it majestically
swims, it doesn't
care if REMORAID attach to it for
scavenging its
leftovers.

name: Skarmory
flavorText:
Its sturdy wings
look heavy, but
they are actually hollow and light,
allowing it to fly
freely in the sky.

name: Houndour
flavorText:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

name: Houndoom
flavorText:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

name: Kingdra
flavorText:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.

name: Phanpy
flavorText:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

name: Donphan
flavorText:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

name: Porygon2
flavorText:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

name: Stantler
flavorText:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

name: Smeargle
flavorText:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

name: Tyrogue
flavorText:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

name: Hitmontop
flavorText:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.

name: Smoochum
flavorText:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

name: Elekid
flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

name: Magby
flavorText:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

name: Miltank
flavorText:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

name: Blissey
flavorText:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

name: Raikou
flavorText:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

name: Entei
flavorText:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

name: Suicune
flavorText:
It races around the world to
purify fouled water. It dashes
away with the north wind.

name: Larvitar
flavorText:
It feeds on soil.
After it has eaten
a large mountain, it will fall
asleep so it can
grow.

name: Pupitar
flavorText:
Its shell is as
hard as sheet
rock, and it is also very strong.
Its THRASHING can
topple a mountain.

name: Tyranitar
flavorText:
Its body can't be
harmed by any sort
of attack, so it is very eager to
make challenges
against enemies.

name: Lugia
flavorText:
It is said that it
quietly spends its
time deep at the bottom of the sea
because its powers
are too strong.

name: Ho-Oh
flavorText:
Legends claim this
POKéMON flies the
world's skies con­ tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

name: Celebi
flavorText:
This POKéMON wan­
ders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which
it has appeared.
